scripts.download-ffmpeg-darwin-x64: mkdirp public/ffmpeg/darwin-x64 && cd public/ffmpeg/darwin-x64 && wget https://github.com/mifi/ffmpeg-build-script/releases/download/6.0/ffmpeg -O ffmpeg && wget https://github.com/mifi/ffmpeg-build-script/releases/download/6.0/ffprobe -O ffprobe && chmod +x ffmpeg && chmod +x ffprobe
scripts.download-ffmpeg-darwin-arm64: mkdirp public/ffmpeg/darwin-arm64 && cd public/ffmpeg/darwin-arm64 && wget https://github.com/mifi/ffmpeg-builds/releases/download/6.0/ffmpeg-darwin-arm64-v6.0 -O ffmpeg && wget https://github.com/mifi/ffmpeg-builds/releases/download/6.0/ffprobe-darwin-arm64-v6.0 -O ffprobe && chmod +x ffmpeg && chmod +x ffprobe
scripts.download-ffmpeg-linux-x64: mkdirp public/ffmpeg/linux-x64 && cd public/ffmpeg/linux-x64 && wget https://github.com/mifi/ffmpeg-builds/releases/download/6.0/ffmpeg-n6.0-12-ga6dc92968a-linux64-gpl-shared-6.0.tar.xz -O ffmpeg-ffprobe.xz && tar -xv -f ffmpeg-ffprobe.xz && mv ffmpeg-n6.0-12-ga6dc92968a-linux64-gpl-shared-6.0 extracted && mkdirp lib && mv extracted/bin/{ffmpeg,ffprobe} extracted/lib/lib*.so* lib
scripts.download-ffmpeg-win32-x64: mkdirp public/ffmpeg/win32-x64 && cd public/ffmpeg/win32-x64 && npx download-cli https://github.com/mifi/ffmpeg-builds/releases/download/6.0/ffmpeg-n6.0-12-ga6dc92968a-win64-gpl-shared-6.0.zip --out . --filename ffmpeg-ffprobe.zip && 7z x ffmpeg-ffprobe.zip && mkdirp lib && cd ffmpeg-n6.0-12-ga6dc92968a-win64-gpl-shared-6.0/bin && npx shx mv ffmpeg.exe ffprobe.exe *.dll ../../lib
